review: Doc helped me to understand the root cause of my issue and suggested me to follow healthy lifestyle and was very keen towards healthy eating practices. I totally recommend our international friends to visit Dr Vijaylakskmi for any health issues, *** ** *** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly doctor who listens to the patient with lots of patience!I was sweating profusely since 5 days due to wrong medication.Thanks for extending your helping hand!I'm perfectly alright now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is not only dr. For me but second mom who have gave me  life the way she is cant be explained in few words. Just close your eyes and visit her.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
On recommendation from Dr. Satya regarding latent TB and its effects on reproductive in-fertility went to see Dr. Vijayalakshmi Balakrishnan. Once discussions underway few minutes into the appointment with Dr. Vijayalakshmi, she abruptly cut off the discussion and referred back to Dr. Satya. I had come out of Dr.'s office with my questions un-answered.

After coming back to reception, she sent a nurse to charge an extra Rs.400 for a total of Rs.1000.

This has come across as being insensitive and not worth a visit for the money spent.
reply_text: The fees for international patients in cloud nine hospitals is Rs 1000. The secretary, not realizing the patients citizenship got less initially and later rectified it. We have a logging in system as soon as a patient enters a consultation suite and as per the records she was inside the consultation room for 20 mins. So  obviously the patient was not hurried out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Excellent Doctor. 
Holistic Care.
Friendly Approach.
Spends Quality time with the PATIENT and FAMILY MEMBERS
